_header: Have joy Mary Mother and Maid / As the Angel Gabriel message to thee said
_description: ‘þe fyue Ioyes of vr ladi’ — six 6-line stanzas

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
HAue Ioye Marie Modur and MaideAs þe Angel Gabriel Message to
                    þe saide…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Graunt vs þe Ioye þat is aboueÞat neuer
                    haþ endyng. Amen
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title: Þe fyue Ioyes of vr ladi (f. 115ra)
